sources.title: Showdown (1942)
sources.description: Superman's reputation is tarnished when a crook begins committing crimes in a Superman costume. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/showdown-1942/

metadata.Plot: "Friend turned foe" reads the newspaper headline. But Lois Lane suspects there's more to the story of Superman turning into a jewel thief and bank robber. And, of course, Clark Kent, knows it can't be true. But someone is out there committing crimes--and he's doing it dressed like Superman. Clark Kent finally meets the impostor at the opera. And that's where the impostor meets the real Superman. Catching the low-class crook is easy. But behind the cheap gangster is a powerful crime boss. And he proves more resourceful than his stooge.
metadata.Director: Izzy Sparber, Dave Fleischer, Steve Muffati
metadata.Writer: Jerry Siegel, Joe Shuster, Jay Morton
metadata.Actors: Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer
